bibl.title: Prayer from Alexander to Constantine
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 69 (1997), Bibl. Beilage 4, pp. 146-147.
bibl.seg: FARAONE Christopher A., Hymn to Selene - Hecate - Artemis from a Greek Magical Handbook (PGM IV 2714-83).
